source:
TEXT_FESSUM302_02957_SEQ_00P'obyano requires an adventurer to aid in the fireworks festivities of the Moonfire Faire.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM302_02957_SEQ_00* Cette quête est un événement à durée limitée.

P'obyano a besoin de vous pour allumer des feux d'artifice aménagés sur l'eau.

source:
TEXT_FESSUM302_02957_SEQ_01P'obyano asks that you help light fireworks for the Moonfire Faire. Use the summer firework at three firework mortars located in the vicinity of the Isle of Endless Summer.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM302_02957_SEQ_01Cette quête ne peut être commencée et effectuée que pendant la durée de l'événement saisonnier correspondant. Pour plus de détails, veuillez consulter The Lodestone.

P'obyano vous a demandé d'allumer trois à l'aide pour faire plaisir aux visiteurs du festival. Attelez-vous à la tâche.

source: TEXT_FESSUM302_02957_SEQ_02<tab>You used the summer firework on the firework mortars. Report back to P'obyano on the Isle of Endless Summer.
target: TEXT_FESSUM302_02957_SEQ_02<tab>Vous avez allumé les trois feux d'artifice. Retournez auprès de P'obyano pour lui faire votre rapport.

source: TEXT_FESSUM302_02957_SEQ_03<tab>You took word of your deeds back to P'obyano. Speak to her again if you wish to help further with the Moonfire Faire fireworks.
target: TEXT_FESSUM302_02957_SEQ_03<tab>P'obyano vous a chaleureusement remercié<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> pour votre aide. Retournez la voir si l'envie vous vient d'allumer d'autres feux d'artifice.

source: TEXT_FESSUM302_02957_TODO_00<tab>Use the summer firework on a firework mortar.
TEXT_FESSUM302_02957_POBYANO_000_000<tab>Back for more, are you? I'll not turn away an offer to help. Would you see fit to light some more fireworks for us?
target: TEXT_FESSUM302_02957_POBYANO_000_000<tab>Contente que tu aies accepté de nous aider, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! Ça te dirait d'allumer quelques feux d'arrrtifice<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESSUM302_02957_POBYANO_000_001<tab>Just in case you'd forgotten how it is done─you need only throw a summer firework into a firework mortar near where the faire-goers are gathered.
target: TEXT_FESSUM302_02957_POBYANO_000_001<tab>En plus, tu as déjà de l'expérrrience en la matière<var 1D /var>! Cette fois, il te suffira d'allumer trois <var 33 ((EObj)) 0DF61EA7B70302 /var> à l'aide <var 33 ((EventItem)) 0AF61E8DDB0302 /var>.

source: TEXT_FESSUM302_02957_POBYANO_000_002<tab>There is no need for you to speak to Jiriri any further. But this time, I ask that you light fireworks in three locations rather than just the one. Don't overheat out there!
target: TEXT_FESSUM302_02957_POBYANO_000_002<tab>Pas besoin d'aller en discuter avec Jiriri ce coup-ci<var 1D /var>! Quand tu auras terminé, tu n'auras qu'à revenir me voir directement. À tout à l'heurrre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM302_02957_POBYANO_000_010<tab>You simply cannot get enough of these fireworks, can you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Very well, you'll hear no complaints from me.
target: TEXT_FESSUM302_02957_POBYANO_000_010<tab>Tu es toujours partant<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> pour allumer des feux d'arrrtifice<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESSUM302_02957_POBYANO_000_011<tab>The task is the same as before. Light the fireworks by throwing a summer firework into a firework mortar near where our faire-goers are gathered. I will keep an eye to the skies.
target: TEXT_FESSUM302_02957_POBYANO_000_011<tab>Nickel<var 1D /var>! Comme la dernière fois, il te suffira d'allumer trois <var 33 ((EObj)) 0DF61EA7B70302 /var> à l'aide <var 33 ((EventItem)) 0AF61E8DDB0302 /var>. À tout à l'heurrre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM302_02957_POBYANO_000_020<tab>Remember now─you must throw the summer fireworks into three firework mortars. The faire-goers await. Hurry along, now!

TEXT_FESSUM302_02957_POBYANO_000_030<tab>Yet another job well done. Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. If you care to help further, you know where to find me. Until then, have a merry Moonfire Faire!
target: TEXT_FESSUM302_02957_POBYANO_000_030<tab>Merci, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! On en a tous pris plein les mirrrettes<var 1D /var>! Tu peux revenir m'aider quand tu veux<var 1D /var>!
